description: Immortal Cities: Children of the Nile is a city-building game in which players construct buildings, issue edicts, and tend to citizens' needs. The original edition of the game was released in 2004; an Enhanced Edition was released in 2008.

CotN contains a tutorial campaign that teaches players how to play the game before they begin their first campaign. This tutorial describes everything from the game's basics to advanced strategies. It is saved in a TUT file.
